summary: Today is September 8,2019 and its the 1000th day without one direction. I miss seeing them as a group but im proud of the boys...
body: Today is September 8,2019 and its the 1000th day without one direction. I miss seeing them as a group but im proud of the boys for where they are now. To all the directioners who stays, y’all are for keeps! 💜 This is not the end, 1d will be back and it will be a fucking blast

blog.description:
Heya, it's me, Loki! I'm 21 years old and from Germany. I'm nonbinary and use they/them pronouns.
This is my side blog just dedicated to art both by me and artists I like.
If you want to see more, you can find me on Instagram as pride.pixels . My main on tumblr is halokiwi.

summary: The Dutch movie "Jongens" has become one of my favourite movies over the last weeks. I can only recommend it to anyone who loves...
body:
Jongens (Boys) 🌈

The Dutch movie “Jongens” has become one of my favourite movies over the last weeks. I can only recommend it to anyone who loves watching LGBT+ movies.

It’s about 15 years old Sieger. Together with his best friend Stef he’s part of a relay race team together with two other boys - Marc and Tom.

One day after training all four boys go swimming together. After Stef and Tom leave, Marc and Sieger share a kiss.

After the kiss Sieger is really confused and everything gets somehow complicated.

I started doing this art of the scene where they first kissed.

When I was done I realised that it looked a lot like Harry and Louis.

I asked on my Instagram story if I should add tattoos or keep it like this and it was pretty much 50/50. So I decided to add the tattoos and post both versions. I like it a bit better without the tattoos.

@lillian-edits made an edit of this that you should definitely check out. It helped me a lot with adding the tattoos. (I don’t think she’s posted it on here yet, but you can look at her Instagram.)

reblog.comment:

title: Everything We Had
body:
Harry was there. Harry was always there, through everything. Until he wasn’t anymore. She was his best friend, she was the love of his life. She was also the girl he so stupidly let slip right out of his fingers.

Chapter Eleven

HarrySummer 2017 – LondonHarry held Elise until she cried herself to sleep, until the tears drained all the energy completely out of her, until her eyes fluttered shut and her breathing evened out….

Read more…
